content.rendered:
Contents

  • 1 x Soft or Hard First Aid Bag/Box
  • 1 x Emergency Quick First Aid guide
  • 5 x Conforming Island Dressings 8x10cm
  • 5 x Conforming Island Dressings 5×7.2cm
  • 5 x Absorbent steri Pads 5x5cm
  • 5 x Absorbent Steri Pads 10x10cm
  • 3 x Sterile Gauze Swabs (packs of 5) 7.5×7.5cm
  • 5 x Waterproof Aqua Island Dressing 8.5×9.5cm
  • 50 x Assorted Plastic Plasters
  • 1 x Wound closure strips 38mmx 4mm (pack of 4)
  • 2 x Eye Pads
  • 2 x Sterile Combine 10x10cm
  • 1 x Heavy Crepe with Clip 7.5cm
  • 1 x Heavy Crepe with Clip 10cm
  • 1 x Triangular Bandage (Sling)
  • 3 x Safety Pins
  • 10 x Alcohol Swabs
  • 10 x Iodine Swabs
  • 1 x Roll Hand Tearable elastic tape 25mm
  •  2 x Saline (NaCl) 30ml tube
  • 1 x Eye Bath
  • 1 x Stainless Steel Blunt nose Lister Scissors 14cm
  • 1 x Splinter Forceps 12.5cm
  • 3 x Splinter Probes
  • 1 x Emergency Thermal Blanket
  • 6 x Powder Free gloves (latex free)
  • 1 x Instant Ice Pack
  • 1 x Stingose Spray
  • 1 x Digital Thermometer
  • 1 x Savlon Cream 30g
  • 1 x Moist Burn Pad
  • 1 x Antibacterial Hand Gel 60ml
  • 1 x Resus Mask with Key Ring

excerpt.rendered: The FAMILY DELUXE FIRST AID KIT. It has everything you could want in a first aid kit for at home, or when travelling.
